model.name: Nexus REST VOs
model.description: Nexus Value Objects used in REST API

class.name: AuthenticationSettings
class.description: Remote authentication tokens used in remote authentications against HTTP Proxies and/or protected remote repositories.

field.name: username
field.description: A username to be used in authentication.

field.name: password
field.description: A password to be used in authentication.

field.name: ntlmHost
field.description: The Windows NT Lan Manager to use for authentication.

field.name: ntlmDomain
field.description: The Windows NT Lan Manager Domain to use for authentication.

class.name: RemoteConnectionSettings
class.description: The connections settings defines common connection properties, like retries count and timeouts.

field.name: connectionTimeout
field.description: Connection timeout in milliseconds.

field.name: retrievalRetryCount
field.description: The retry count before remote connection is declared unsuccesful.

field.name: queryString
field.description: Query string that is appended to remote requests.

field.name: userAgentString
field.description: User agent string that is used to customize Nexus user agent string user for remote HTTP requests.

class.name: SystemNotificationSettings
class.description: The notification settings tell nexus who to notify when certain events occur (such as a proxy repository being auto-blocked).

field.name: enabled
field.description: Flag that states whether to enable notifications.

field.name: emailAddresses
field.description: Comma seperated list of email addresses to notify.

field.name: roles
field.description: List of role ids, users assigned to these roles will be notified by email as well.

class.name: SmtpSettings
class.description: The connections settings for an smtp server.

field.name: host
field.description: The smtp host.

field.name: port
field.description: The smtp port.

field.name: username
field.description: The smtp server username.

field.name: password
field.description: The smtp server password.

field.name: systemEmailAddress
field.description: The email address that emails will be sent from.

field.name: sslEnabled
field.description: Flag that states whether to use ssl.

field.name: tlsEnabled
field.description: Flag that states whether to use tls.

class.name: RemoteProxySettingsDTO
class.description: The Remote Proxy defines proxies used to access the internet.

field.name: httpProxySettings
field.description: HTTP proxy settings.

field.name: httpsProxySettings
field.description: HTTPS proxy settings.

field.name: nonProxyHosts
field.description: List of addresses that can ignore the proxy settings.

class.name: RemoteHttpProxySettingsDTO
class.description: The HTTP Proxy defines proxies used to access the internet.

field.name: proxyHostname
field.description: The proxy hostname.

field.name: proxyPort
field.description: The proxy port.

field.name: authentication
field.description: Authentication used to connect with proxy server.

class.name: GlobalConfigurationListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a global configuration list request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is a list of the global configuration items requested.

field.name: data
field.description: List of global configuration items.

class.name: GlobalConfigurationListResource
class.description: An item that contains details about a global configuration item, including the url required to retrieve the configuration details.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The url that can be GET requested to retrieve the details of the global configuration.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the global configuration.

class.name: GlobalConfigurationResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a global configuration request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the global configuration item requested.

field.name: data
field.description: The global configuration details.

class.name: GlobalConfigurationResource
class.description: List of all global configuration items in Nexus.

field.name: securityAnonymousAccessEnabled
field.description: Flag that, if true, will allow anonymous access while security is enabled.

field.name: securityAnonymousUsername
field.description: The username to use for anonymous access (so that roles/privileges can be applied to the anonymous access users).

field.name: securityAnonymousPassword
field.description: The password to use for anonymous access.

field.name: securityRealms
field.description: List of security realms that are enabled for Nexus, note that order IS important.

field.name: globalConnectionSettings
field.description: Global remote connection settings.

field.name: systemNotificationSettings
field.description: System notification settings.

field.name: smtpSettings
field.description: SMTP settings for email notifications that Nexus generates.

field.name: remoteProxySettings
field.description: Remote Proxy Settings.

field.name: globalRestApiSettings
field.description: Rest API configuration parameters.

class.name: RepositoryStatusListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a repository status list request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the list of repository status objects.

field.name: data
field.description: List of repository status objects.

class.name: RepositoryStatusListResource
class.description: Some general details and status of the repostiory.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The URI that can be used to manage the repository

field.name: id
field.description: The id of the repository.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the repository.

field.name: repoType
field.description: The type of repository.

field.name: repoPolicy
field.description: The repository policy.

field.name: format
field.description: The repository format.

field.name: status
field.description: The repository status object

class.name: RepositoryListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a repository list request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the list of repository objects.

field.name: data
field.description: List of repository objects.

class.name: RepositoryListResource
class.description: Repository general details.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: URI used to manage the repository.

field.name: contentResourceURI
field.description: URI used to access repository over /content URL (as maven would do for example).

field.name: id
field.description: The id of the repository.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the repository.

field.name: repoType
field.description: The type of the repository.

field.name: repoPolicy
field.description: The policy of the repository.

field.name: provider
field.description: The repository provider.

field.name: providerRole
field.description: The role of the repository (classname).

field.name: format
field.description: The format of the repository.

field.name: userManaged
field.description: Flag that states if the repository is manageable by the user.

field.name: exposed
field.description: Flag that states if the repository is exposed over the content url.

field.name: effectiveLocalStorageUrl
field.description: The URL where the repository storage is on server.

field.name: remoteUri
field.description: The remote URI of the repository.

class.name: RepositoryResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a repository request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the repository object.

field.name: data
field.description: The repository object.

class.name: RepositoryBaseResource
class.description: The repository base object, this could be extended by a new object if new fields are required.

field.name: contentResourceURI
field.description: The URL to access the content resource of the repository.

field.name: id
field.description: The id of the repository.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the repository.

field.name: provider
field.description: The provider of the repository (i.e. maven, p2, obr, etc.).

field.name: providerRole
field.description: The role of the repository (i.e. Repository, GroupRepository, etc.).

field.name: format
field.description: The format of the repository.

field.name: repoType
field.description: The type of the repository.

field.name: exposed
field.description: Flag that states whether the repository should be available over the content resource.

class.name: RepositoryResource
class.description: Hosted or Proxy repository parameters, extending the base resource.

field.name: writePolicy
field.description: Write policy on the repository, allows for no write, write once, overwrite, etc.

field.name: browseable
field.description: Flag that states if the repository is browseable.

field.name: indexable
field.description: Flag that states if the repository is indexable.

field.name: notFoundCacheTTL
field.description: How long requests should remain in the NFC before checking for existance again.

field.name: repoPolicy
field.description: The repository policy (release, snapshot).

field.name: checksumPolicy
field.description: The repository checksum policy (ignore checksum errors, dont download if checksum errors, etc.).

field.name: downloadRemoteIndexes
field.description: Flag that states if the proxy repository should download indexes from remote repository.

field.name: overrideLocalStorageUrl
field.description: User defined storage directory on server (which is not the default).

field.name: defaultLocalStorageUrl
field.description: The default storage directory on the server.

field.name: remoteStorage
field.description: The remote storage details.

class.name: RepositoryShadowResource
class.description: Shadow (or Virtual) repository parameters, extending the base resource.

field.name: shadowOf
field.description: The repository that this virtual repository is shadowing.

field.name: syncAtStartup
field.description: Flag that determines if the virtual repository should sync its content with master on startup.

class.name: RepositoryProxyResource
class.description: Proxy repository parameters, extending the repository resource.

field.name: fileTypeValidation
field.description: Check the remote file content to see if it is valid. (e.g. not html error page) handy when you cannot enable strict checksum.

field.name: artifactMaxAge
field.description: The max age of artifacts before we will check remote again for updates (in milliseconds, -1 for never).

field.name: metadataMaxAge
field.description: The max age of metadata before we will check remote again for updated (in milliseconds, -1 for never).

field.name: itemMaxAge
field.description: The max age of items (not artifact not metadata) before we will check remote again for updated (in minutes, -1 for never).

field.name: autoBlockActive
field.description: Flag that determines is the proxy repository "Auto block" feature active for this repository.

class.name: RepositoryResourceRemoteStorage
class.description: Remote storage details for the proxy repository.

field.name: remoteStorageUrl
field.description: The remote URL that this repository is proxying.

field.name: authentication
field.description: The authentication details of the remote connection.

field.name: connectionSettings
field.description: The connection settings for the remote connection.

class.name: RepositoryStatusResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a repository status request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the repository status objects.

field.name: data
field.description: Repository status details.

class.name: RepositoryStatusResource
class.description: Repository status parameters.

field.name: id
field.description: The id of the repository.

field.name: repoType
field.description: The type of the repository.

field.name: format
field.description: The format of the repository.

field.name: localStatus
field.description: The local status of the repository (user blocked for example).

field.name: remoteStatus
field.description: The remote status of the repository (unreachable for example).

field.name: proxyMode
field.description: The repository proxy mode (allow, blocked, etc.).

field.name: dependentRepos
field.description: The lsit of repositories that shadow this repository.

class.name: RepositoryDependentStatusResource
class.description: Details of a repository that shadow another repository.

field.name: id
field.description: The shadow repository id.

field.name: repoType
field.description: The shadow repository type.

field.name: format
field.description: The shadow repository format.

field.name: localStatus
field.description: The shadow repository local status.

class.name: RepositoryMetaResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a repository metadata request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the repository metadata object.

field.name: data
field.description: The repository metadata parameters.

class.name: RepositoryMetaResource
class.description: Details about the repository.

field.name: id
field.description: The repository id.

field.name: repoType
field.description: The repository type.

field.name: format
field.description: The repository format.

field.name: sizeOnDisk
field.description: The size on disk the repository consumes.

field.name: freeSpaceOnDisk
field.description: The size available on disk where the repository is located.

field.name: fileCountInRepository
field.description: The number of files held in the repository.

field.name: notFoundCacheSize
field.description: The number of requested paths that are currently in the not found cache.

field.name: notFoundCacheHits
field.description: The number of checks against the not found cache that have succeeded (and thus saved a remote check).

field.name: notFoundCacheMisses
field.description: The number of checks against the not found cache that have failed (and thus required a remote check).

field.name: localStorageErrorsCount
field.description: The number of errors reported by local storage.

field.name: remoteStorageErrorsCount
field.description: The number of errors reported by remote storage.

field.name: groups
field.description: List of repository groups that this repository is contained in.

class.name: RepositoryGroupListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a repository group list request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the list of repository group objects.

field.name: data
field.description: List of repository group objects.

class.name: RepositoryGroupListResource
class.description: The basic set of details of a repository group.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: URL used to manage the repository group.

field.name: contentResourceURI
field.description: URL used to manage content of the repository group.

field.name: id
field.description: The id of the repository group.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the repository group.

field.name: format
field.description: The format of the repository group.

field.name: exposed
field.description: Flag that states if the repository group is available over the content resource.

field.name: userManaged
field.description: Flag that states if the repository is manageable by the user.

class.name: RepositoryGroupResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a repository group request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the repository group object.

field.name: data
field.description: The repository group object.

class.name: RepositoryGroupResource
class.description: The set of items that define the repository group (extends repository base resource).

field.name: repositories
field.description: List of repositories that this repository group contains (order IS important).

class.name: RepositoryGroupMemberRepository
class.description: A repository that is contained within a group.

field.name: id
field.description: The repository id.

field.name: name
field.description: The repository name.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The URL used to manage the repository.

class.name: RepositoryRouteListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a repository route list request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the list of repository route objects.

field.name: data
field.description: List of repository route objects.

class.name: RepositoryRouteListResource
class.description: A repository route basic set of details, for display in lists (full details can be retrieved using the resourceURI).

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The URL used to manage this repository route.

field.name: groupId
field.description: The group this route is attached to.

field.name: ruleType
field.description: The type of rule (inclusive, exclusive, etc.).

field.name: pattern
field.description: The pattern associated to this route.

field.name: repositories
field.description: The list of repositories in the associated group, that will be applied to route (or excluded based upon ruleType).

class.name: RepositoryRouteResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a repository route request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the repository route object.

field.name: data
field.description: Repository Route details.

field.name: id
field.description: The id of the repository route.

field.name: groupId
field.description: The group id that the route is applied on.

field.name: ruleType
field.description: The rule type of the route (inclusive, exclusive, etc.).

field.name: pattern
field.description: The regex pattern that will be matched to see if route is applied to request.

field.name: repositories
field.description: The list of repositories in the group that will be included (or excluded depending on ruleType).

class.name: RepositoryRouteMemberRepository
class.description: Repository details in a repository route.

field.name: id
field.description: The repository id.

field.name: name
field.description: The repository name.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The URL that can be used to manage the repository.

class.name: ScheduledServiceListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a list of scheduled service items, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the list of scheduled services..

field.name: data
field.description: List of scheduled services.

class.name: ScheduledServiceListResource
class.description: Scheduled service list item details.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The URL that can be used to manage the scheduled service.

field.name: id
field.description: The id of the scheduled service.

field.name: enabled
field.description: Flag that states if the service is enabled.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the scheduled service.

field.name: typeId
field.description: The type id of the scheduled service.

field.name: typeName
field.description: The type name of the scheduled service.

field.name: status
field.description: The status of the scheduled service (running, broken, etc.).

field.name: readableStatus
field.description: The status of the scheduled service (running, broken, etc.).

field.name: schedule
field.description: The type of schedule the service is run on (monthly, daily, etc.).

field.name: nextRunTime
field.description: The next time the scheduled service will run.

field.name: lastRunTime
field.description: The last time the scheduled service ran.

field.name: lastRunResult
field.description: The result of the last scheduled service run.

field.name: created
field.description: The date the scheduled service was created.

field.name: nextRunTimeInMillis
field.description: The next time the scheduled service will run (in milliseconds).

field.name: lastRunTimeInMillis
field.description: The last time the scheduled service ran (in milliseconds).

field.name: createdInMillis
field.description: The date the scheduled service was created (in milliseconds).

class.name: ScheduledServiceResourceStatusResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a scheduled service status request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the scheduled service status.

field.name: data
field.description: The scheduled service status details.

class.name: ScheduledServiceResourceStatus
class.description: Scheduled service status details.

field.name: resource
field.description: The scheduled service configuration.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The URL used to managed the scheduled service.

field.name: status
field.description: The status of the scheduled service.

field.name: readableStatus
field.description: The status of the scheduled service (running, broken, etc.).

field.name: nextRunTime
field.description: The next time the scheduled service will run.

field.name: lastRunTime
field.description: The last time the scheduled service ran.

field.name: lastRunResult
field.description: The result of the last service run.

field.name: created
field.description: The date the service was created.

field.name: nextRunTimeInMillis
field.description: The next time the scheduled service will run (in milliseconds).

field.name: lastRunTimeInMillis
field.description: The last time the scheduled service ran (in milliseconds).

field.name: createdInMillis
field.description: The date the scheduled service was created (in milliseconds).

class.name: ScheduledServiceResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a scheduled service configuration request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the scheduled service configuration.

field.name: data
field.description: The scheduled service configuration.

class.name: ScheduledServiceBaseResource
class.description: The scheduled service configuration.

field.name: id
field.description: The id of the service.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the service.

field.name: enabled
field.description: Flag that states if the service is enabled.

field.name: typeId
field.description: The type id of the service.

field.name: alertEmail
field.description: The email to send notifications to if the service fails.

field.name: schedule
field.description: The schedule the service is run on.

field.name: properties
field.description: A list of configuration properties for the service.

class.name: ScheduledServicePropertyResource
class.description: A configuration property for a scheduled service.

field.name: key
field.description: The id of the property.

field.name: value
field.description: The value of the property.

class.name: ScheduledServiceOnceResource
class.description: A service that is run only once.

field.name: startDate
field.description: The date to start running the service.

field.name: startTime
field.description: The time to start running the service.

class.name: ScheduledServiceHourlyResource
class.description: A service that is run hourly.

field.name: startDate
field.description: The date to start running the service.

field.name: startTime
field.description: The time to start running the service.

class.name: ScheduledServiceDailyResource
class.description: A service that is run daily.

field.name: startDate
field.description: The date to start running the service.

field.name: recurringTime
field.description: The time of the day to run the service.

class.name: ScheduledServiceWeeklyResource
class.description: A service that is run weekly.

field.name: recurringDay
field.description: The list of days that the service will be run.

class.name: ScheduledServiceMonthlyResource
class.description: A service that is run monthly.

class.name: ScheduledServiceAdvancedResource
class.description: A service that is run on a cron schedule.

field.name: cronCommand
field.description: A cron schedule string.

class.name: ScheduledServiceTypeResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a scheduled service type list request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the scheduled service type details.

field.name: data
field.description: List of scheduled service types.

class.name: ScheduledServiceTypeResource
class.description: Scheduled service type, which you can create a scheduled task against.

field.name: id
field.description: The id of the service type.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the service type.

field.name: formFields
field.description: List of task form fields that configure the task.

class.name: ContentListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a content resource request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is a list of the content items requested.

field.name: data
field.description: List of ContentListResource objects, each of which represents a single item in the repository.

class.name: ContentListResource
class.description: A Content Item definition, including all data needed to properly access the item, and understand the item.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The URI that can be used to directly access this item in the future.

field.name: relativePath
field.description: The relative path in relation to the root of the repository.

field.name: text
field.description: A name of the content item.

field.name: description
field.description: A (possibly longer) description of the content item.

field.name: leaf
field.description: Flag that states whether the content item is a file item (if true), otherwise it is a folder item, and can use the resourceURI to retrieve the contained content.

field.name: lastModified
field.description: Timestamp the item was last modified.

field.name: sizeOnDisk
field.description: Size of the item on the disk.

class.name: ContentListDescribeResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a content resource request, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is a list of the content items requested.

field.name: data
field.description: List of describe items, that will contain useful information about the retrieved data.

class.name: ContentListDescribeResource
class.description: Details about the requested item, that should be useful in finding how the item was retrieved.

field.name: requestUrl
field.description: The original request url used to access the resource.

field.name: processingTimeMillis
field.description: The number of milliseconds that passed while retrieving the item.

field.name: request
field.description: A set of request parameters for the item.

field.name: response
field.description: A set of response parameters for the item.

class.name: ContentListDescribeRequestResource
class.description: A set of request parameters that were used to retrieve the item.

field.name: requestUrl
field.description: The request url that initially generated this request.

field.name: requestPath
field.description: The path on the server that was requested.

field.name: requestContext
field.description: A list of String objects that were in the Restlet request context.

class.name: ContentListDescribeResponseResource
class.description: A set of response parameters that were sent back with response.

field.name: responseType
field.description: States the type of item that was returned (or NONE if not found).

field.name: responseActualClass
field.description: The classname of the returned item.

field.name: responsePath
field.description: The path of the item in the repository.

field.name: responseUid
field.description: A string that uniquely defines this item in the system (or 'virtual' if this is an item from a virtual repository).

field.name: originatingRepositoryId
field.description: The id of the repository this item was retrieved from (or null if this is an item from a virtual repository).

field.name: originatingRepositoryName
field.description: The name of the repository this item was retrieved from (or null if this is an item from a virtual repository).

field.name: originatingRepositoryMainFacet
field.description: The main facet (Repository implementation) of the repository this item was retrieved from (or null if this is an item from a virtual repository).

field.name: processedRepositoriesList
field.description: List of repositories that were processed while retrieving this item (in case item was retrieved via a group url, for example, would list all repositories in the group scanned until item was found).

field.name: appliedMappings
field.description: List of mappings applied while retrieving this item.

field.name: properties
field.description: List of extra properties containing more information.

field.name: attributes
field.description: List of attributes stored on disk for the item.

field.name: sources
field.description: If this is a composite item, the list of sources that this item was generated from.

field.name: notFoundReasoning
field.description: Tree of reasons why something was not found.

class.name: NotFoundReasoning
class.description: REST Response object for reasoning why something is not found.

field.name: notFoundReasoning
field.description: If this is a composite item, the list of sources that this item was generated from.

class.name: ConfigurationsListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a list of Nexus configuration objects, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is a list of the configuration items.

field.name: data
field.description: List of Nexus configuration objects.

class.name: ConfigurationsListResource
class.description: A Nexus configuration item, and the url needed to retrieve the configuration details.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The url that can be accessed to retrieve details about the configuration.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the configuration item.

class.name: FeedListResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for a list of Nexus feed items, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is a list of the feed items.

field.name: data
field.description: List of feeds available from Nexus.

class.name: FeedListResource
class.description: Details about an RSS Feed that Nexus supplies.

field.name: resourceURI
field.description: The URL that must be used to retrieve the feed data.

field.name: name
field.description: The name of the feed.

class.name: NexusAuthenticationClientPermissions
class.description: Permissions that are granted to the user.

class.name: NFCResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for an NFC resource item, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the NFC resource item.

field.name: data
field.description: An object which contains the contents of the NFC.

class.name: NFCResource
class.description: Contains a list of items stored in the NFC.

field.name: nfcContents
field.description: List of NFC repository items.

class.name: NFCRepositoryResource
class.description: Details about NFC usage for a repository.

field.name: repositoryId
field.description: The repository id that the nfc details are for.

field.name: nfcStats
field.description: NFC statistics.

field.name: nfcPaths
field.description: List of paths in the NFC.

class.name: NFCStats
class.description: NFC Statistics.

field.name: size
field.description: The number of paths stored in the NFC.

field.name: hits
field.description: The number of checks against this NFC that have found matches.

field.name: misses
field.description: The number of checks against this NFC that have not found matches.

class.name: StatusResourceResponse
class.description: REST Response object for the nexus status, contains the typical 'data' parameter, which is the nexus status.

field.name: data
field.description: Nexus status details.

class.name: StatusResource
class.description: Nexus status details.

field.name: appName
field.description: The application name.

field.name: formattedAppName
field.description: The formatted application name (html formatting).

field.name: version
field.description: The version of the nexus instance.

field.name: apiVersion
field.description: The version of the core nexus instance.

field.name: editionLong
field.description: The long version of the nexus edition (i.e. Open Source or Professional).

field.name: editionShort
field.description: The short version of the nexus edition (i.e. OSS or PRO).

field.name: attributionsURL
field.description: The attributions page URL.

field.name: purchaseURL
field.description: The URL of where to buy the product.

field.name: userLicenseURL
field.description: The URL of where the End User License Agreement can be found.

field.name: state
field.description: The state of the nexus instance.

field.name: operationMode
field.description: The operation mode of the nexus instance.

field.name: initializedAt
field.description: The date the instance was first initialized.

field.name: startedAt
field.description: The date the instance was last started.

field.name: lastConfigChange
field.description: The last time the nexus configuration was updated.

field.name: firstStart
field.description: Flag that states if this is the first time nexus was started.

field.name: instanceUpgraded
field.description: Flag that states if the nexus instance has been upgraded.

field.name: configurationUpgraded
field.description: Flag that states if the nexus configuration has been upgraded.

field.name: configurationValidationResponse
field.description: Configuration validation status.

field.name: errorCause
field.description: Errors occuring during nexus startup.

field.name: clientPermissions
field.description: Permissions that are available to the current user.

field.name: baseUrl
field.description: The base url of the nexus instance.

field.name: licenseInstalled
field.description: Flag that states if currently there is a license installed.

field.name: licenseExpired
field.description: Flag that states if current installed license is expired.

field.name: trialLicense
field.description: Flag that states if current installed license is a trial license.

class.name: StatusConfigurationValidationResponse

field.description: Flag that states if the nexus configuration is valid.

field.name: modified
field.description: Flag that states if nexus had to modify the nexus configuration.

field.name: validationErrors
field.description: List of configuration validation errors.

field.name: validationWarnings
field.description: List of configuration validation warnings.

class.name: ArtifactResolveResource

field.name: version

field.name: classifier

field.name: extension
field.description: The file extension of the requested artifact.

field.description: Flag that states if requested artifact is a snapshot.

field.name: snapshotBuildNumber

field.name: fileName
field.description: The filename of the requested artifact.

field.name: sha1

field.name: repositoryPath

field.name: discoveryEnabled

class.name: RoutingConfigMessageWrapper

field.name: data
field.description: The requested Routing config.

class.name: RoutingDiscoveryStatusMessage
class.description: Routing Discovery Status details.

field.name: discoveryEnabled
field.description: The discovery is enabled or not.

field.name: discoveryIntervalHours
field.description: Update interval in hours.

field.name: discoveryLastStatus
field.description: The last discovery status, was it successful (1) or not (-1), or still running (0).

field.name: discoveryLastStrategy
field.description: The strategy used (once finished).

field.name: discoveryLastMessage
field.description: The message of discovery (strategy dependant, once finished).

field.name: discoveryLastRunTimestamp
field.description: When discovery last run, timestamp (in millis) or -1 if not yet finished.

class.name: RoutingStatusMessage
class.description: Routing Status details.

field.name: publishedStatus
field.description: The publishing status, was it published (1), or not (-1) or not processed or still processing (0).

field.name: publishedMessage
field.description: The publishing accompanying message.

field.name: publishedTimestamp
field.description: The timestamp of last publishing (in millis) or -1 if not published.

field.name: publishedUrl
field.description: The URL of the published prefix file or null if not published.

field.name: discovery
field.description: Filled for proxy repositories, null for everything else.

class.name: RoutingStatusMessageWrapper
class.description: REST request object to retrieve Routing status.

field.name: data
field.description: The requested routing status.
